title: (x) Moët Rosé - ITC Legacy Sans {Miguel}
content:
Hi Fellow typofiles.

I am lookin’ for the font used in the “ROSÉ” part of the logo.

Anyone?

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Moet.gif](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=Moet.gif) | 10.08 KB |
author: jaksi

comments.content: Lightened version of [ITC Legacy Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20051219072033/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-legacy-sans-2/), I guess.

All right then…

Close enough for me.

Thanx

_\> Close enough for me._

[This is actually it](http://web.archive.org/web/20051219072033/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.9268.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=ROS%C3%89&sampleSize=96) — I suspect they added a white outline and customised the _accent aigu._
